name: Josho's and Sketch shroom horrible camp
name_original: Josho's and Sketch shroom horrible camp
description:
You're name is Sciurus, and we welcome to The camp of Josho and Sketch shroom, the great founders! Your goal is to collect badges and go into the cabin, you'll love what's inside!

Walk: wasd

Jump: space

sprint: shift

read notes: stand on top of the note

Talk to character: right click
